duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct various timber inventories and vegetation surveys, chainsaw use for timber stand improvement and invasive species control, reforestation, and other contract specific requirements.

Work with members of the DJM ecological restoration teams on tasks including prairie installation, land stewardship, green roof installation and maintenance, stream bank stabilization, detention basin installation and maintenance, erosion/sediment control, watershed management directives, and reforestation.

education_certification.credential: 4-year degree in Forestry or related field (with 1-2 years of field experience preferred) or a 2-year degree in a related field with a minimum of 2 years of applicable field experience.
